thread.section_title: The Milburn Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great location and really really comfortable
thread.title_full: great location and really really comfortable - Review of The Milburn Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: tashmoo47
title: great location and really really comfortable
text: upper west side hotel in wonderful location .. clean, quiet, comfortable and safe neighborhood .. restaurants, shops and markets nearby and metro 4 blocks away with express to times square and connections to everywhere in the city .. we were upgraded to a large 2 room suite with microwave, refrigerator, table, sofa in living area and large bedroom and large bath and huge flatscreen in both rooms .. so comforable we never wanted to leave .. stayed 4 nights and would stay there again any time .. staff friendly and helpful .. couldn't ask for anything more .. it is an older hotel that has retained all of its charm
